name: Jalal Ahmed
post: I am very happy with the laptop i received from this site. What i really love about it is laptop design and parformance. Plus this site's customer service is excellent.

name: Salikur Islam
post: This is the second laptop that I have had. The first one I purchased was a refurbished one and I liked the simplicity of it over the laptop with Windows 10. Since no more updates were available I decided to purchase a new one.

name: Saifur Rahman
post: The laptop is looking very nice in the image though it's very expensive for me. I buyed this product last 2 years ago and It's performance is excellent. I recommend everyone to purchase this product.

name: MD Mustafizur Rahman
post: Since the game doesn't take much to run in this laptop, I'm going to say between 60 to 120 fps. It's an older game and this laptop has been able to handle all the newer games I've installed without having to turn down any graphics yet. But the real question is why would you want to install fortnite.

name: Rasel Ahmed Rahul
post: This laptop was basically exactly what I was looking for. Before then, I never owned a true gaming PC. The only computer I owned before that wasn’t a hand-me-down was a 2016 Acer Aspire E15 with an Intel i5 and a NVIDIA GeForce 940MX graphics card with 8GB of memory.

name: Saifur Suhag
post: This computer came appearing totally fine. Unfortunately it emits a horrible ear piercing high pitch sound whenever it is on so now I have to send it back to get fixed causing me to be without a computer for two weeks. At least the warranty covers it’s repair. I will update my review when I get my laptop back.

name: Tufayel Ahmed
post: The screen quality is great. Works very easily with my cricut design space
